    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Result execute(long userId,
                      UpdateForm form)

        Execute method that is in charge of taking the class UpdateForm and adapting it to the a class Update.Request if possible. If it is not able to, it will respond with errors.

        Otherwise, it will execute the UserUserWrapper.update method. If this method returns an class AccessReport respond with errors. If not, this means the class Update command was executed, check if the method was a success or not

        Parameters:
        userId - the User's id
        form - the class UpdateForm object
        See Also:
        class UpdateForm, class Update.Request, UserUserWrapper.update, class AccessReport, class Update
